data.content:
# Barkak Domino - Project Setup Session

## Summary
Cleaned up git tracking and migrated project data from `_local/` to GitHub origin.

## Actions Taken

### 1. Git Cleanup
- Removed `.pyc` files from git tracking (7 files)
- Created `.gitignore` with Python, Node, IDE ignores
- Committed: `chore: remove .pyc from tracking and add .gitignore`

### 2. Missing Files Committed
- Added `frontend/src/components/Boneyard.tsx` (React component)
- Added `frontend/public/images/` (20 avatars, bar background, logo)
- Committed: `feat: add Boneyard component and bar-themed assets`

### 3. Data Migration
Migrated project data from `_local/barkak-domino` to `github.com/brunosmmm/barkak-domino`:
- **9 annotations** migrated (bugs, todos, ideas)
- **1 knowledge entry** migrated (Fly.io deployment instructions)

## Current Project State

### Pending Annotations
| Type | Summary |
|------|---------|
| bug | Taunts/reactions have WebSocket latency |
| idea | Interactive tile picking phase |
| idea | Mini game board visualization |
| idea | Sound taunts from sound bank |
| idea | Visual distinction for multiple play options |
| todo | Epic moment detection and effects |
| todo | Bar aesthetic theme overhaul (INPROGRESS) |
| todo | Text chat system |
| todo | i18n support |

### Project Knowledge
- Fly.io deployment: `~/.fly/bin/flyctl deploy`
- Live URL: https://barkak-domino.fly.dev/

### Tech Stack
- Backend: FastAPI + WebSocket
- Frontend: React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind
- Deployment: Fly.io with Docker multi-stage build
data.context: Session start - cleaned up git tracking and migrated project data from _local/ to GitHub origin
data.title: Barkak Domino - Project Setup Session
